meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Krishna Veeraraghavan Jen Regan Randy Mathews Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7748.

td.p: Krishna Veeraraghavan, a sales analyst from Seattle, Washington
Jen Regan, a travel marketer from North Bergen, New Jersey
Randy Mathews, a fragrance specialist from Houston, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,000)

tr.td: THE FAST & THE FASTIDIOUS
STATE CAPITAL FACTS
CROSSOVER TV
ON THE BIG MONEY
DAMON RUNYONESQUE GANGSTER LINGO
WHAT'S YOUR SPIRIT ANIMAL?
